TopicTitle: [WIP] [1.0.5] (Dev Paused) QuizTech Aero Pack v1.2.9.x | Updated: 8/9/15 |

Articles.Content: Nice blade, i like the detail on the rotor^^
Best rotor model ever ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
hey will there be FAR support?
can you do a powerful jet engine, without gimbal, but an afterburner mode? like the rapier mode switch

> 
> can you do a powerful jet engine, without gimbal, but an afterburner mode? like the rapier mode switch

That doesn't work, since the engine has to spool up from zero every time you switch modes.
wow ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

I became a part of this forum just to tell you that I'm REALLY impressed by your work! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

If you are going to make the rotor tweakable, then I suggest that you add a height field as well (i.e. the height between the base of the part and the center of the rotors).

I do like the small touch that you made with the white strips on the leading edges of the rotors because they give the rotors a certain depth.

absoloutely Epic! I cannot wait until the Helicopter parts are ready for release. yo ualso do Wicked Iva's! I cant wait to make an osprey as well! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> absoloutely Epic! I cannot wait until the Helicopter parts are ready for release. yo ualso do Wicked Iva's! I cant wait to make an osprey as well! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

If you want an osprey cockpit, try Phantom Works:

 [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109567-FantomWorks-KAX-Part-Pack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109567-FantomWorks-KAX-Part-Pack)

Not quite the same art style, but whatever.
yeah but I'm sure this will have an epic IVA! like most of his other cockpits ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

Those look amazing dude. I've been wanting to model a set of vertical lift stuff since I am a huge fan of helicopters (and I work on them for a living ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)).

Hi Quiznos, any idea why the CKAN config doesn't match the install instructions? It is forcing install of ModuleRCSFX and RPM Core which are clearly not required dependencies according to your manual install instructions and 1.2.9 package contents.

I installed them all anyway though because I wanted this cool mod ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
ModuleRCSFX is a dependency, for the VTOL RCS thruster. Not sure about RPM.
Bump for Love!
I'd love to see a Hind style cockpit with this mod. If no one has suggested it yet, of course. Then I merely second their opinion. With a mounting point for a chin turret.

Hey all,

I will be pausing development on the pack until further notice due to my studies and general busyness irl. I love making stuff for you guys and will be back when my schedule allows it! Thanks for all of your patience and support!

-Quiznos

![aiHpW4xh.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/aiHpW4xh.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-28T18:15:59Z" title="09/28/2015 06:15  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 28, 2015</time> by Quiznos323**
we miss you ;(

Hi first thing i have to say is amazing design, i seen it in action but i have a problem. after moving everything in the Gamedata folder into KSP Gamedata, and launching the game it seems to always get stuck on Module manager, i have already searched to see if there was any other Module manager files in the KSP folder, but there wasn't, and i have updated the Module manager file to the latest but still did nothing. i also tried launching the game without the Module manager file but it gets stuck on the Mk2TwinTurboJet files, and other files from engine folder. Idk if those folders need Module manager but i'm really stuck. it would be wonderful if you could help me please.

Firstly, welcome to the forums! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Now, as to your support request, we need your output log to diagnose the problem. If you are unsure of what that is, or where to find it, please read [this](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229).

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-02T02:06:49Z" title="11/02/2015 02:06  AM" data-short="8 yr">November 2, 2015</time> by NightmaresTYS**

This has to be one of my favorite mods of all time. I can't think of a better way to spend my time than to build an F-22 with your parts, outfit it with guns from BD Armory, and set it loose on some stock planes.
@**NightmaresTYS** Could we get a screencap of your gamedata folder?

May I suggest this A-7 Corsair II cockpit, but as 1.25m with intake part cut off (we can add it ourselves with other parts) and 0.625m node instead of nosecone? It would be useful not only for this plane but for a bunch of other designs as well.

![NimAC8478A7.JPG](http://www.steelnavy.com/images/WEM350NimitzAC/NimAC8478A7.JPG)
